DataElement.preferredName: Post Surgical Procedure Venous Thromboembolism Preventive Intervention Technique Therapies Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the technique used to prevent occlusion of the lumen of a vessel by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream in the veins after a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Surgical Procedure Venous Thromboembolism Preventive Intervention Technique
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the technique used to prevent occlusion of the lumen of a vessel by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream in the veins after a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of, or pertaining to, or contained in, or performing the function of the veins.:Occlusion of the lumen of a vessel by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream.:An attempt to prevent disease.:A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

Concepts.definition: Of, or pertaining to, or contained in, or performing the function of the veins.
Occlusion of the lumen of a vessel by a thrombus that has migrated from a distal site via the blood stream.
Therapeutic, nutritional, environmental, social and/or behavioral interventions at the societal, community, organizational or individual levels to reduce, modify or stop the course of a disease.
A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update
